title: Police Arrest Suspect for Rape of 13-Year-Old Who Was Unable to Get an Abortion
description: Police in Clarksdale, Miss., have arrested a suspect in the alleged rape

title: Actor Danny Masterson Sentenced to 30 Tears to Life in Rape Case
description: A judge sentenced That ’70s Show star Danny Masterson to 30 years to life in prison Thursday for the rapes of two women two decades ago.

title: Actor Danny Masterson Sentenced to 30 Years to Life in Rape Case
description: A judge sentenced That ’70s Show star Danny Masterson to 30 years to life in prison Thursday for the rapes of two women two decades ago.

title: What Companies Can Learn About Climate Action From a Study on Plastic Take-Out Cutlery
description: Researchers tried a simple fix to the pervasive problem of wasted plastic cutlery. The findings show how companies can promote better habits.

title: How Mexico Became a Gender Equality Leader in Government
description: The country looks set to get its first female President, after Claudia Sheinbaum was chosen to be the ruling party's 2024 candidate.

title: Why You Should Think Before Telling Mothers ‘They’re Only Little Once’
description: "When my first child was a toddler and I could not afford daycare, I tried embracing the phrase."

title: Can Climate Policy Survive a Future GOP Administration?
description: Republicans don't like climate policy but the path to nix it may be more difficult than meets the eye.

title: Animals Don’t Have AC
description: Animals can’t—and aren’t—equipped to handle extreme heat, writes Adam Welz.

title: The Anti-Vax Movement Isn’t Going Away. We Must Adapt to It
description: 'If we can’t prevent outbreaks, we will need to learn to live with them,' write Mark Navin and Katie Attwell.

title: New Biden Book Offers Ammo For Those Hoping He Sits 2024 Out
description: Franklin Foer’s "The Last Politician" paints a portrait of an insecure president who admits to friends he’s feeling every bit of his 80 years.

title: Australia and China Hold First High-Level Dialogue in 3 Years—a Sign of a Slight Thaw
description: The countries have clashed on everything from human rights to COVID-19 origins to trade. The dialogue in Beijing will focus on trade, people-to-people links and security.

title: Coal Reliance Clouds India’s Climate Leadership
description: New Delhi frets over the risks that come with abandoning coal, a fuel regarded as cheap and readily available — at a time when energy security and cost concerns are paramount.

title: What Does the ‘Global South’ Actually Mean?
description: Everyone seems to be talking about the Global South these days—but what, exactly, is it? Despite how it sounds, it’s not really a geographical term.

title: After Multiple Setbacks, a Japanese Rocket Bound for the Moon Finally Takes Off
description: The launch offers relief to a battered national space program following a string of weather delays, major setbacks, and high-profile failures.
